zimbra_domains_add_domain_select_title: Select a domain from the list
zimbra_domains_add_domain_input_title: Enter a domain name not managed by our OVHcloud account
zimbra_domains_add_domain_success_messag: Your add-in request has been submitted. It will be executed in a few moments.
zimbra_domains_add_domain_error_message: Unable to submit your add-in request. {{ error }}
zimbra_domains_add_domain_configuration_: How do you want to configure your DNS zone?
We configure your service to ensure the best level of security.
You can customize the configuration and choose when to switch your emails to this service.
Your {{domain}} domain will be configured in authoritative mode.
To confirm that you are the owner of this domain, please add this record.
You have 48 hours to complete this validation. You can find this information later in the domain table.
Once your domain has been validated, you will need to modify the MX and SRV records in your DNS zone manually.
You can find the information required in the section for the associated domain.
zimbra_domains_add_domain_warning_modifi: You must ensure that the DNS zone of the chosen domain can be modified by its administrator.
